 * *IRI* = http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/UBERON_0000072
 * *Label* = segment of respiratory tract
 * *Definition* = An organ segment that is part of a respiratory tract [Automatically generated definition].
 * *Comment* = Note that MA:0000434 has subclasses upper and lower, so it corresponds to a segment of the tract, rather than the tract as a whole

## Synonyms

 * respiratory tract
